gw.api.exception

Interface HasErrorInfo

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    com.guidewire.pl.domain.contact.AddressBookUnavailableException, AlreadyExecutedException, BadIdentifierException, BadInputException, BatchProcessException, CCAddressBookUnavailableException, ContactSubtypeSpecificException, ContactSystemContactNotFoundException, ContactSystemNotAvailableException, ContactSystemPluginException, CorsException, DataConflictException, DataConversionException, DataTypeException, DisplayableException, DuplicateKeyException, EntityStateException, EntityValidationException, ExternalizableException, FetchLimitExceededException, FieldConversionException, FieldFormatException, GWIllegalArgumentException, InternalServerErrorException, LoginException, NotAcceptableException, NotAuthorizedException, NotFoundException, OperationNotSupportedException, PermissionException, RequiredFieldException, RestAuthenticationException, RestExceptionWithErrorInfo, ServerStateException, ServiceUnavailableException, SOAPException, SOAPRetryableException, SOAPSenderException, SOAPServerException, TerminatedException, TooLooseContactSearchCriteriaException, TransformFailedException, UnknownTypeKeyException, UnsupportedContentTypeException, com.guidewire.pl.web.controller.UserDisplayableException

    public interface HasErrorInfo
    This interface is only valid for exceptions, this is a flag interface indicating that any implementing class has error information that can be extracted.
